meanings.definition: The study of the movements and relative positions of celestial bodies interpreted as having an influence on human affairs and the natural world.
meanings.sent1: Many people enjoy reading about astrology in magazines to learn about their zodiac signs.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe that astrology can predict their future based on the alignment of stars.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that her cat's behavior was due to astrology and the moon's position.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the chaos of the city mirrored the unpredictability of astrology.
meanings.sent5: The concept of astrology fascinated me as a child, imagining stars guiding our destinies.

meanings.definition: The belief in or study of the supposed influences of the stars and planets on human affairs and natural phenomena.
meanings.sent1: Her interest in astrology led her to explore the impact of planets on personalities.
meanings.sent2: Astrology has been practiced for centuries, influencing cultures around the world.
meanings.sent3: During the party, the conversation turned to astrology, sparking debates on horoscopes.
meanings.sent4: The artist's interpretation of the night sky was a beautiful dance of astrology in paint.
meanings.sent5: As the storm brewed outside, she found solace in the constancy of astrology readings.
